attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of England, Wales and Northern Ireland (as well as Scotland) are all part of one United Kingdom. Surely it is quite wrong that one part of the United Kingdom can decide whether the United Kingdom as a whole should end. For we are one Kingdom and one Country - let's keep it that way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
